dmca.title: Re: [Fwd: [ABUSE] DMCA Violation]
dmca.body:
We are unable to locate on the web page
www.supremex.net/modules.php?name=Forums any of the material that you claim
is being infringed as of 10:47:32 a.m. (GMT-6).

Legal Response Team
ThePlanet.com 

-----Original Message-----
From: Tault Admin [mailto:admin@tault.com] 
Sent: Friday, February 24, 2006 3:42 PM
To: Legal Response
Subject: Re: [Fwd: [ABUSE] DMCA Violation]

Actually please check the sites information in comparison to taultunleasheds
information.  theplanet / tault is your login to our website.  You can do a
fast comparison to see all his information is a direct copy and paste of our
sites.  We should not be required to spend money just to prove he is
stealing information directly from our site.

----- Original Message -----
From: "Legal Response" <legal-response2@theplanet.com>
To: <admin@tault.com>
Cc: <Theplanet@chillingeffects.org>
Sent: Friday, February 24, 2006 12:14 PM
Subject: FW: [Fwd: [ABUSE] DMCA Violation]


> To Whom It May Concern:
>
> Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
> substantially comply with the required notification elements of the 
> Digital
> Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"), as it does not identify (a) the
> copyrighted work claimed to have been infringed and (b) the material that 
> is
> claimed to be infringing, and information reasonably sufficient to permit
> the The Planet to locate the said material.
>
>
> Legal Response Team
> THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf Of
> The Planet Policy Enforcement
> Sent: Thursday, February 23, 2006 2:38 PM
> To: copyright@theplanet.com
> Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] DMCA Violation]
>
> -----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
> Hash: SHA1

> Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at 
> the
> address of copyright@theplanet.com.
>
> - --
> Thanks,
>
> Policy Enforcement
> The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
> http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
>
>
